oai_dc:dc.dc:title: French tanks going into line

oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Tanks (Military science); Tracklaying vehicles; Motorcycles; War damage; World War, 1914-1918
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A number of tanks headed down a road and accompanied by several soldiers on foot and one on a motorcycle. The scarred terrain appears in the background of the shot.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Karl Kleeman World War I Photographs
